description: Web-based UI for MCP ecosystem - dashboard for docs-mcp, coderef-mcp, personas-mcp. Visual workorder tracking, project management, tool execution. Potential SaaS with team features, GitHub integration, AI chat interface, templates marketplace.

ui_options_considered: SaaS Platform - cloud-hosted with team features
Hybrid CLI + Web Sync - best of both worlds
key_features: Team Collaboration - multiple agents, shared context
GitHub Integration - auto-sync repos, PRs, issues
AI Chat Interface - natural language to MCP tools
Analytics - time saved, features shipped, code quality
notes.unique_value_prop: AI-native project management - not just tracking tasks, but executing them with AI agents
